verbose_text: Interestingly in these cells mPTP activation required a longer time and was more strongly inhibited by CSA compared to c-subunit KO cells (46 +/- 10 s, n = 6 for the KO vs. 210 +/- 22, n = 6 for wild-type [WT], p < 0.001) (XREF_FIG).
evidence: mPTP activation required a longer time and was more strongly inhibited by CSA
